'''Bedrock Editor v0.9.7''' is a minor beta release for the [[Bedrock Editor]] released on April 29, 2025, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://github.com/Mojang/minecraft-editor/discussions/235|title=Release 0.9.7 (1.21.90.21)|website=GitHub|date=April 29, 2025}}</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/36203344176269-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-90-21|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.90.21|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=April 29, 2025}}</ref>

== Additions ==
* Added block picker modes to filter blocks either by name or color.

== Changes ==
* Updated Editor logging to not flash the screen when a global error occurs.
* Updated tutorial step confirmation for movement stage.
* Updated the farm tool to have a preview bounding box.
* Updated the block image thumbnail size from 128×128 to 64×64 resulting in 1/4 texture memory requirements for terrain blocks.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug to prevent crashes when multiple players try concurrently exporting.
* Fixed a bug where block thumbnail images weren't correctly presented after changing video mode while in an Editor world.
* Fixed a crash while using the Flatten Brush tool while targeting air.
* Fixed a bug where clicking the color box didn't close the open color picker popup.
